title: I'm bored, give me a new champ to learn
body:
Not including a poll because I own 85/126 champions.

* No champions for jungle, I don't really jungle
* Preferably no super high skill champs, I'm low Gold and I know my limits
* Preferably not a meta pick. I like being a hipster and more importantly being able to play a champ without having to worry about someone picking or banning them
* Convince me of why I should play that champ if you want, or don't, whatever

Go nuts GD
